articles.title: Belarusian Olympian who says she faced punishment back home leaves for Europe - CBC.ca
articles.description: A Belarusian Olympic sprinter who had a public feud with officials from her team left Tokyo en route to Europe on Wednesday.
articles.content: A Belarusian sprinter left Tokyo en route to Europe on Wednesday after resisting an attempt by her Olympic team's officials to send her home to Belarus, where the athlete said she could be in danger … [+1039 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: In heat emergency, southern Europe scrambles for resources - New York Post
articles.description: A heat wave in southeast Europe has fueled wildfires in Turkey and threatened the national power grid in Greece as governments scrambled to secure the resources to cope with the emergency.
articles.content: ATHENS, Greece A heat wave baking southeast Europe has fueled deadly wildfires in Turkey and threatened the national power grid in Greece as governments scrambled Monday to secure the resources neede… [+4137 chars]
